## clickTestId() function

Click an element identified by a test ID (`data-testid=` attribute). Selecting and clicking happens in the same tick, so this is safe to call even if the client application may currently be rerendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function clickTestId(page: Page, testId: string, { extraMessage, timeout, visible, assertSuccess, retryUntil }?: VisibleOption & TimeoutOptions & RetryOptions & ExtraMessageOption): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  testId | string | The test ID to look for. |
|  { extraMessage, timeout, visible, assertSuccess, retryUntil } | [VisibleOption](./pentf.visibleoption.md) &amp; [TimeoutOptions](./pentf.timeoutoptions.md) &amp; [RetryOptions](./pentf.retryoptions.md) &amp; [ExtraMessageOption](./pentf.extramessageoption.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
